alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 11:54AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Seminole, northern Brevard, southeastern Orange and Volusia Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1153 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Jessup to Wedgefield. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Daytona Beach, Port Orange, Sanford, and Titusville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Seminole
